sent.orig: Article 18 The health and quarantine organ may set up its agent organ if necessary.
sent.trans: 第十八条卫生检疫机关根据工作需要，可以设立派出机构。

sent.orig: This byelaw encourages citizen alms remains and organ, prohibit remains and, organ.
sent.trans: 该条规勉励人民捐输尸体和器官，严禁生意尸体、器官。

sent.orig: This feature is composed of all the organ systems, as the body's cognitive organ.
sent.trans: 组成此功能系统的所有器官，称为体人的认知器官。

sent.orig: Lung is the mainly involved targeting organ of multiple organ dysfunction syndrome.
sent.trans: 肺是多器官功能障碍综合征最主要的靶器官。

sent.orig: Methods Fifteen characters of vegetative organ and reproductive organ were made system observation and survey.
sent.trans: 方法系统观察并测量各变异类型主要形态学性状，采用多角形图比较其相似性和差异性程度。
